title: 4 People Shot In Downtown Denver Early Sunday, 1 Critical
content:
DENVER (AP/CBS4) – Four people were shot in downtown Denver early Sunday.
Police earlier tweeted that two of the four were in critical condition. One of those victims has since stabilized and only one remains in critical condition.
The shooting happened about 1:30 a.m. on the west side of the downtown area near Cherry Creek.
According to Raquel Lopez with Denver Police, one possible suspect is in custody and police aren’t looking for additional suspects. Lopez said detectives were interviewing witnesses and the victims.
